text: The following English statements are given * All people who do not smoke and attend parties are happy * Single people attend parties + John is single and does not smoke * Happy people have exciting lives The statements can be wntten as follows in clause form 1 smoke(X) v —party(X) v happy(X) 2 —single(Y) v party(Y) 3 single(john) 4 —smoke(john) 5 —happy(Z) v exciting(Z) 31 Use resolution refutation to show that someone has an exciting Iife (1 e (10) exciting(W)) by using the assumptions in the paragraph above 32 What does 1t mean to say that resolution I1s refutation-complete? (2)
